backend/main.mo: Main backend canister with access control, customer form submission, user profile management, and admin role operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for deploying the application to IC mainnet, including prerequisites and environment configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app with metadata, favicon, and root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with routes, error boundary, analytics hook, and dashboard/admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component displaying admin access denial with actions to log in, return home, or logout.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Form component handling customer input, validation, file uploads, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/DashboardFilters: Provides search and sorting controls for dashboard listings using input and select components.
Renders admin dashboard header with navigation, branding, and a user dropdown including logout.
frontend/src/components/DashboardStats.t: Displays total, todayâ€™s, and last 7 days submission statistics computed from customer form data.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTable.t: Shows a scrollable table of customer submissions with metadata and attachment view/download actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying company info, contact details, and attribution with dynamic year and branding.
frontend/src/components/GetFreeQuoteCtaS: Marketing CTA section prompting users to request a free quote and scroll to the contact form.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and contact bar using BRANDING constants and router navigation.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, marketing text, and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Renders a grid of insurance service cards using predefined service data and icons.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionsDashb: Dashboard that fetches, filters, sorts, and displays form submissions with health checks, error handling, and logout support.
frontend/src/components/SupportSection.t: Support section showing contact options including phone, email, and office hours in card layout.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Centralized branding configuration containing logo paths, company info, and contact details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Hook that checks backend health using an anonymous actor and reports status with auto-refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for forms, admin status, admin creation, and admin list management using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetAdminCredenti: Empty placeholder file for reset-admin-credentials hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrafficAnalytics.t: Stub analytics hook that logs page views to console since backend tracking is removed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config with brand color variables, dark mode theme, animations, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardL: Admin layout that verifies authentication and admin status, shows loading or access denied, and renders nested routes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManagement: Admin management UI for listing, adding, and removing admin principals with validation and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login flow handling Internet Identity auth, admin verification, error states, and redirect logic.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page composing header, hero, services, form, and footer components.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorMapping.t: Maps backend errors into categorized user-friendly messages with retry guidance.
frontend/src/utils/logOnce.ts: Utility to log specific errors only once, with functions to clear logged keys.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Provides validation and formatting utilities for Dfinity Principals, including checks for empty, anonymous, or invalid IDs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing and retrieving values from sessionStorage, and managing persisted routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and enabled plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and requirements related to implementing admin creation and admin management features to resolve authorization issues.
